website_summaries.verdict: Reliable sandbags designed by a reputable company. It’s a premium purchase with reinforcement features; well worth the price.
pros: Heavy-duty design with durable natural materials
Bags are double-stitched on the bottom and come with a pre-attached tie string, securing both areas
Delivered in sealed bag to prevent burlap from being exposed to moisture during shipping
cons: Some complaints about the porous design
Inconsistent packaging for correct number of bags

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I chose these particular burlap sacks with durability in mind and they are great. Stitching is tough, ties are tough, and burlap is thick and tough. I even ran some through my washing machine to see how that would affect them and they held up. These are not big enough for a sack race. They are just the right size for making a sand bag. They were also just right for our family to take gathering pine nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Pace

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to hold down our pool cover reel set. We filled the bags with sand and placed two on each end of the reel set. The reel set no longer moves while we wind or unwind. I highly recommend these bags. They look just like the ones we used in the army to build barriers. And you know they army. They always use 1st-class stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly  Avery

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting bags.
customer_reviews.text: Finally get a chance to buy good burlap bags. Now I can use them on my driveway to steer water away from washouts.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel R Voisine

customer_reviews.title: Bulk head
customer_reviews.text: Used these to fill with concrete and used in the river for bulk heads. They worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this was burlap as noted in description. 10 bags and great value. Used for canopy and half tent at the beach. Filled with sand in morning and dumped out in evening.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good biodegradable product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with the intent of having them biodegrade without leaving plastic in the environment. These are great biodegradable bags that are sturdy for the near-term installation work.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Quality sand bags
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent sand bags. They're tough. I had no issues with loose seams or inconsistent bags, and best of all, they're biodegradable. I'll definitely be purchasing from Sandbaggy again if I ever need more sand bags!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Okeefe

customer_reviews.title: It worked, but had holes too big for sand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a play. They had holes that were too big to hold sand without spilling out. I used beans instead. It worked fine for a play
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E. Tincknell

customer_reviews.title: Natural material, not plastic
customer_reviews.text: Well made bags with robust top ties. Can't argue with that .....
customer_reviews.author: R. Pullan

customer_reviews.title: Plan on returning
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and porous, cheaply made, not worth the price. Plan on sending them back
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good and useful. It will be better if the open entrance can be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Lee

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: They weren't a very tight weave and didn't hold together very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sand bags
customer_reviews.text: have not had long, so do not know durability...it seems very durable
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kling

customer_reviews.title: Wrong amount sent
customer_reviews.text: The description said 10 came in a bag and I only received 5. Couldn’t use for the my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Dolgin

customer_reviews.title: They work and they blend well.
customer_reviews.text: The burlap bags work perfectly for my water control needs. They are also less unattractive than the standard white bags.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Auletta

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Most bags lasted two months before breaking and spilling all sand. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great product and arrived right on time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and no problems. Box is perfect for storing the bags between floods.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fairly durable. Used as Archery Backstop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I stacked them against a ply wood board to make a wall for an Archery Backstop. Stops my arrows at 300 FPS.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality with timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: The bags were reasonably priced and of good quality. We needed in a rush and they were delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good sandbag from a small CA business Sandbaggy. Can't find in hardware stores
customer_reviews.author: peter485

customer_reviews.title: Very good delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received it what I was told I would receive it, Cant get better then that.
customer_reviews.author: james B.

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the bag.  Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good value and really fast delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product as expected - slight chemical odor as described in listing, odor did fade after time
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Degrade fast..
customer_reviews.text: First impressions were good, although they were a bag short on the order (received 9 instead of the 10 I ordered). Simple burlap sandbag.. I mean, what is there to write about. However, I've had these out for about a month now and they are already starting to fail. Maybe it's true of all similar burlap bags, but there is no way you're laying these down for a few weeks and then picking them up and moving them somewhere else without at least half of them splitting. I won't be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Iain D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags to create a "curb" to direct the flow of water when it rains heavily. I soaked the bags in water and then put 40 lbs of dry Quickrete into each with a scoop. I tied the top with the attached string and tucked it under the filled bag. The bags nestled together and formed a barrier. I sprinkled them with water sparingly for a few days. Very happy with how they are functioning. I am not sure how long the burlap covers will take to wear off. They have been in place for several months and have not changed in appearance. I am quite happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Either wrong description or they're just going by the label
customer_reviews.text: I paid for burlap bags, I received white plastic bags, with a label that says burlap on it, but that is definitely not what these are.
customer_reviews.author: C. Orosco

customer_reviews.title: Strong sand bags,
customer_reviews.text: I like these burlap bags and believe they will last quite a few years for erosion control on my steep bank. Really fast shipping too. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and environment-friendly
customer_reviews.text: These bags are far superior in every way to the polypropylene bags, and I highly recommend them. They are sturdy and biodegradable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cravagan

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These bags were great for what I was going to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Galarza

product_meta.title: Sandbaggy Burlap Sand Bag - Size: 14" x 26" - Sandbags 50lb Weight Capacity - for Flooding, Flood Water Barrier, Tent Sandbags, Store Bags - Sand Not Included (10 Bags)
feature_bullets: WIDELY TRUSTED: Trusted by many government agencies, landscapers/contractors and nonprofits including the US Army and Red Cross. That’s why they are the #1 best selling burlap sandbags on the Internet. Whether for hurricanes on the East Coast or flooding in the Midwest, Sandbaggy sandbags have been there every step of the way as the first and last line of defense for the homes and businesses of everyday Americans.

100% BIODEGRADABLE AND ECO-FRIENDLY: 100% naturally grown from jute plants -- Sandbaggy Burlap Bags use no synthetic materials and naturally biodegrade. Zero clean-up. Zero carbon emissions. Zero trash in landfills.

MILITARY GRADE: With a double stitched bottom and a 50 lb weight capacity, these Sandbaggy Sandbags are ready to be filled with gravel or sand. Wide 14 inch opening makes our sandbags easy to use & easy to fill

CUSTOMERS LOVE THEM: “These are excellent sand bags. They're tough.” says Phil O. “These are great biodegradable bags that are sturdy for the near-term installation work.” says JB. “Great value for great product.” says Shawn
Now to the nitty gritty details -- If you’re not familiar with burlap, it does have a unique smell. Don’t worry -- the smell will go away after the roll is installed and the roll is aired out.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
